title: AI Data Insights Analyst
subtitle: Turn raw data into actionable intelligence in seconds
description: Stop waiting days for reports. Our AI analyst connects to your data sources, identifies patterns humans miss, and delivers insights in plain English—empowering faster, smarter decisions.

targetAudience.title: Companies Without BI Teams
targetAudience.description: Get enterprise-grade analytics without hiring expensive data analysts. Ask questions in plain English, get instant answers.

targetAudience.title: Executives & Founders
targetAudience.description: Real-time dashboards that tell you what matters. Make data-driven decisions without waiting for analyst bottlenecks.

targetAudience.title: Marketing Teams
targetAudience.description: Finally understand what's driving revenue. See true attribution across channels and optimize spend in real-time.

targetAudience.title: Operations Leaders
targetAudience.description: Identify bottlenecks before they become problems. Optimize processes with data, not guesswork.

benefits.title: Real-Time Dashboards
benefits.description: Auto-generated visualizations that update live, showing the metrics that matter most to your business.

benefits.title: Natural Language Queries
benefits.description: Ask questions in plain English like 'What drove last month's revenue spike?' and get instant answers.

benefits.title: Anomaly Detection
benefits.description: Proactively alerts you to unusual patterns, opportunities, and potential issues before they become problems.

benefits.title: Predictive Analytics
benefits.description: Forecast trends, churn risk, and revenue projections using machine learning models trained on your data.

features.title: Universal Connectors
features.description: Connects to any data source—databases, spreadsheets, APIs, and SaaS tools.

features.title: Auto-Visualization
features.description: Automatically selects the best chart types and layouts for your data.

features.title: Pattern Recognition
features.description: ML algorithms that surface correlations and trends humans might miss.

features.title: Smart Alerts
features.description: Get notified when KPIs hit thresholds or anomalies are detected.

features.title: Automated Reports
features.description: Schedule and distribute reports to stakeholders automatically.

features.title: Data Security
features.description: Enterprise-grade encryption and role-based access controls.

useCases.title: Executive Reporting
useCases.description: Auto-generate board-ready reports with key metrics, trends, and recommendations.

useCases.title: Marketing Attribution
useCases.description: Understand which channels and campaigns drive real revenue, not just clicks.

useCases.title: Operations Optimization
useCases.description: Identify bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and opportunities to reduce costs.
